item.title: ?You Won't Believe What Happened When This Person Tried to Make the World Record Paper Airplane!
item.description: Introduction to the Attempt for a World Record Paper Airplane Making a paper airplane is a classic pastime that most of us have enjoyed at one point or another. But one person decided to take it to the next level and attempt to break the world record for the longest paper airplane flight! Preparation for the Attempt This person had to do a lot of preparation before attempting the world record.
